title: ‘Sinners’ Production Designer Hannah Beachler on Weaving in Folklore, History and Sprituality Into Her Sets
summary: When Ryan Coogler called on his go-to production designer, Hannah Beachler, to work on “Sinners,” she ended up building a deeply researched, meticulously crafted the world, filled with cultural references and Easter eggs. But the film is more than a great vampire movie; it spoke to folklore, spirit…
